A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It does not follow with the original star wars themes or rules if you will.  Characters do things with the force that are not in line with what the previous movies established\, major jokes are common in the middle of serious scenes\, and kylo rin is the worst \"evil\" character they've ever had in all of the star wars.  I was angry by the end of the movie and I am only a casual fan.   93% rating seems like a conspiracy.  I give it a 60% for visual effects only.
